snippet.title: The Zium Garden (Launch Trailer)
snippet.description:
The Zium Garden (2018)

Available for exploring on September 15th, 2018

zium / noun / informal:  1. a virtual gallery game, composed of eclectic and wonderful things.  2. (kind of like a zine, but the museum version)

The Zium Garden is a Museum Exploration Game filled with artwork and installations from over 50 artist from around the world. Including;

Alivia Horsley (@slugspoon)
Belinda Zoller (@theberlz)
Benjamin Gattet (@ragekit)
Benjamin Vedrenne (@_glkt)
Charlit Floriano (@CharlitFloriano)
Chip Forest (@chipforest)
Chris Chappelear (@chrischaps)
Colorfiction (@colorfiction)
Daniel P Lopez (@oliverblueberry)
Dziff (@dzifyr)
Dorian Beaugendre (@tahitip4ncake)
Easton Self (@eastonself)
Emily E Meo (@EmilyEMeo)
Eric Juvi (@YorkEGJ)
Everest Pipkin (@everestpipkin)
Funsworkings (@funsworkings) 
Gabriel Koenig (@GhostTimeGames)
Gabrielle Genevieve (@elloradatura)
Gaël Bourhis (@gaelBourhis)
Gigoia Studios (@gigoiastudios)
Ickypatchi (@Pois0nJam)
Indiana Jonas (@indianajonas)
Izzy Gramp (@Shrubbette‏)
Ivan Notaros (@Nothke)
Jason Sutherland (@DriftPrism)
Jonatan Van Hove (@joonturbo)
Joost Eggermont (@aJoostEggermont)
Kai Chuan (@bykaichaun)
Karolina Koryl (KarolinaKoryl)
KTRON-8 (@Ktron_8)
Katherine Diemert (@theknoodle)
Keane Ng (@keanerie)
Leon Denise (@leondenise)
Matthew Keff (@matthewkeff)
Menno Wittebrood (@MennoWittebrood)
Michel Ziegler (@dasmirts) 
Moshe Linke (@moshelinke)
Nicholas O’Brien (@__nkO)
The Nomi (@the_nomi)
Paul Lancelot (@Lanceloks) 
Pol Clarissou (@polclarissou)
Quinn Spence (@QuinleySquare)
RavenWorks (@RavenWorks)
Rob Fitchman (@bobacupcake)
Ryan Trawick (@AYNIKGames)
Space Backyard (@SpaceBackyard)
Studio Oleomingus (@studiooleomingu)
Tanja Mölholm (witch_jpeg)
Titouan Millet (@Titouan_Millet)
Tom Kitchen (@tom_kitchen)
Tom Victor (@robomachin)
Torfi Asgeirsson (@torfias)
Veronica Graham (@most_ancient)
Whacktastic Bear (@WhackasticBear)
Xavier Ekkel (@XavierEkkel)
and Zenuel (@PaleFeatherZen)


The Zium Project was conceived, created and curated 
by Michael Berto (@thesaveroom)  

The Zium Society Inner Cloister for The Zium Garden are:

Michael Berto (@thesaveroom)  - Curator, Developer and Project Director
Quinn Spence (@QuinleySquare) - Co-Curation and Classic Stuctures
Gigoia Studios (@gigoiastudios) - Garden Environments
Ivan Notaros (@Nothke) - Garden Buildings
Veronica Graham (@most_ancient) - Art Design
Richard Walsh (@whilefun) - Tools and Optimisation 

Every artist involved with The Zium Garden was a gracious tester and collaborator throught the process. The work on display belongs to the artists who created and submitted the pieces  for collection and display, humbly with 
The Zium Project.

for more information; @thezium

email enquiries/bug reports/information:
theziumsociety@gmail.com
